title: Advanced Whey Protein Isolate Formula
description: Our proprietary WPI blend features 25g of rapidly absorbed complete amino acid profile with enhanced bioavailability through CFM and ultra-filtration processes. Contains all 9 EAAs including 5.5g BCAA (2:1:1 ratio L-leucine:L-isoleucine:L-valine) optimized for MPS stimulation. Fortified with digestive enzymes (protease, lactase, lipase) to minimize GI distress and maximize protein synthesis efficiency. Zero artificial sweeteners, utilizing natural stevia leaf extract and monk fruit. NSF certified for competitive athletes.
